logoFingerprint.notes: All identified branding elements exhibit clear raised texture indicative of embroidery. The graphic on the hoodie and sweatpants is identical in design, color, and technique. The circular element on the hoodie's left sleeve is a pre-made embroidered patch sewn onto the garment. The image resolution is sufficient to discern thread texture, ruling out flat printing, sublimation, or smooth silicone techniques.
